struct length {
  double value;
  enum unit {
    metre,
    kilometre,
    millimetre,
    centimetre,
    inch,
    foot,
    yard,
    mile,
  };
  static constexpr double factors[] =
    {1.0,    1000.0,  1e-3,
     1e-2,   0.0254,  0.3048,
     0.9144, 1609.344};
  explicit length(double v,
                  unit u = metre)
  {
    value = v * factors[u];
  }
};

length operator+(length lhs,
                 length rhs)
{
  return length(lhs.value +
                rhs.value);
}
